messages.message: Hi @Dale DeLoy , just would like to double check, a new created user is not asked to reset password in your sandbox. Do you receive email verification instead? Thanks
Initially did not get either.  I went to the login page and I had to ask for the verification email to be sent again
I see. That's another bug. But if email verification is enabled, we don't ask for password reset
I then got the email and verified and logged in with the original password

From the code, on-prem user will be created by admin and needs to reset their password. For non on-prem users, they are supposed to register their account and set their own password. We only verify their email instead
On your sandbox, the user is assumed to be non on-prem, and even it's created by admin, they will only receive verification email

Thanks Yan, thanks for diving into the code. I now recall having run into this with Jessica before, where we only had one bit of data to tell us the state of the user. So this first-time password reset only works in our customer’s on-prem environments right now. It’s a bit more involved to bring this feature into our envs, we’ll keep this Jira-ed and prioritize it alongside our other upcoming user-related Saas work.
